description:
Grayson had been deep-throating Calvin's big dick for a few minutes. He came up for air, paused for a moment, and then kind of smacked his lips with a curious look.

"What's going on?" I asked.

"I'm just surprised," he said. "I've tasted cum before, but his tastes really, really good!"

With that, Calvin just beamed, as if he'd been awarded the Nobel prize or something. It was the cutest thing I've ever seen!

Grayson was a little ball of energy that day. He loves compliments about his body. So when Calvin told him, "You have amazing pecs... I just want to 'motor boat' them," he was really happy, even though I don't think he knew what "motor boating" was.

Calvin was also having a lot of fun.

"The only problem with barebacking Grayson," he told us, "is that his ass is so tight it makes me want to bust!"

Grayson had a big smile on his face.

"So," Calvin continued, "I'm going to have to pace myself so I can make it last!"
title: Grayson & Calvin: Bareback
